group_1.textCenter: The annual meeting with Mizuna Girls' Academy is coming up,
This time, it's our turn to host the event!
Everytime, I ask one person from each grade to help out,
With the classroom reservations and hospitality arrangements.
The four people who will be in charge this time, @are listed on the printout.
I know this will be hard, but please do your best @until the event.

group_1.textLeft: It's my turn... @The classroom reservations.

group_1.textRight: That concludes today's student council activities.

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh*...

group_1.textRight: What's with that sour look on your face?
You're in charge of the exchange party preparations! @Do you think you can manage that?!

group_1.textLeft: *Sniffle*... No way... I can't do that...
I've heard it's really difficult to prepare for.
I wonder if I can...
*Giggle* Don't worry, Hotori.

group_1.textRight: Yuuna...

group_1.textLeft: Because your senpais have done this before.
If there's anything you don't understand, you can @ask them.
And if you still need help, you can always ask me.

group_1.textRight: Wouldn't you just suggest renting out a hotel or restaurant?
The Mizuna Girls' Academy will sure be in for a @surprise.

group_1.textLeft: No, I wouldn't do that.
If money is used to solve every problem, you will @never get closer to your ideal self.

group_1.textRight: My ideal self...
Thank you, Yuuna. @I will do my best!

group_1.textLeft: Good.

group_1.textRight: And... good luck getting closer to your ideal, "that person".

group_1.textLeft: Yes... @I will be trying my best....

group_1.textRight: Yuuna...? What's wrong?
"How can I get closer to 'that person'" is what you're thinking, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yes... That's correct...
Ah, I wonder if I am being too careless...

group_1.textRight: Ooh...

group_1.textLeft: That graceful, divine, and overwhelming aura...!
Just the sight of her defeating that Witch has...

group_1.textRight: Wait, wait! Yuuna, calm down!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:305001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...Aah!?
S-sorry, I was getting carried away...

group_1.textRight: A-anyway...
Here’s the book you were looking for!

group_1.textLeft: Ah! Yes, that's it.
Thank you, I will be reading it carefully.

group_1.textRight: Yuuna, is that...?

group_1.textLeft: How can I become closer to her...
I think it's important for a person to deepen their intellect and education.
So I would like to ask you both for recommendations.

group_1.textRight: Well, I don't mind lending it to you, but...
I wonder if you can get closer to the person you @admire just by reading?

group_1.textLeft: Yes... Reading alone will probably not be enough...
At the very least, I need to be able to do what she does...

group_1.textRight: There is something you can do Yuuna!

group_1.textLeft: There is?...

group_1.textRight: Fight Witches!
And save people who have the Witch’s Kiss!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I can certainly do that…!
That, is a wonderful idea Hotori!

group_1.textRight: Mmm...@[chara:304101:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:304101:eyeClose_1][chara:304101:lipSynch_1]Hehe...

group_1.textLeft: Then it's decided! Let's go Hotori, Rion!

group_1.textRight: Eh?... Where are we going?

group_1.textLeft: To find a Witch of course!
